fullText:
最新出的一款轻量级基于LLM的文档解析模型：MonkeyOCR，性能好速度快

其3B在英文文档解析任务上平均性能超过了Gemini 2.5 Pro和Qwen2.5-VL-72B

对多页文档解析，它的处理速度达到每秒0.84页，超过了MinerU的0.65页/秒和Qwen2.5-VL-7B的0.12页/秒 https://t.co/XDw6fTjHOH

user.name: Ksenia Se
user.description: • mom to 1 girl and 4 boys • building @TheTuringPost. As one of the readers put it: “Always scientifically minded, low hype”. Machine learning-AI-Business-Life

fullText:
How much do LMs memorize vs generalize?

A cool paper from @AIatMeta, @GoogleDeepMind, @Cornell, and @NVIDIA researchers proposes a new way to measure memorization.

By isolating it, researchers found — GPT models store about 3.6 bits per parameter.

Another interesting shift is https://t.co/bqD3Ih7ILk
